greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of e.g.f. exp(1 - exp(2*x)).
mathematica: nmax = 23; CoefficientList[Series[Exp[1 - Exp[2x]], {x, 0, nmax}], x] Range[0, nmax]!
a[n_] := a[n] = -Sum[2^k Binomial[n - 1, k - 1] a[n - k], {k, n}]; a[0] = 1; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 23}]
results.author: _Ilya Gutkovskiy_, Jun 06 2019
